sent.orig: Use to create a presentation for local playback. Presentation contains high-quality video and audio content.
sent.trans: 用于创建进行本地播放的演示文稿。演示文稿包含高质量的视频和音频内容。

sent.orig: I discount tickets to tomorrow's another presentation a final presentation of a small box.
sent.trans: 我把明天的机票折了又折，最后折成了小小的一个方块。

sent.orig: Group Presentation 35% Presentation date as per schedule.
sent.trans: 小组报告35%报告的日期按照课程的安排。

sent.orig: Equivalent alternatives for any multimedia presentation shall be synchronized with the presentation.
sent.trans: 对任何多媒体之呈现，其等效之替代说明均应与之同步呈现。

sent.orig: Nim settled himself in the witness chair, aware that his presentation would be long and arduous.
sent.trans: 尼姆在证人席上坐定，意识到他的陈述将是又长又费劲的。
